body.name: HAIOOU 5 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom, Large Storage Chest of Drawers Vertical Wooden Dresser Organizer with Power Outlets, Hidden Drawer Compartment for Living Room, Entryway - Modern White
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Spacious & Versatile Storage - 5 full-sized drawers provide spacious space for storing various personal items. The chest of drawers is a perfect fit for the bedroom, more than that, it could serve for multiple storage use in different life scenarios such as in the living room, entryway..

Built-In Charging Station - Equipped with a charging station including 3 power outlets and 2 standard USB ports at the tabletop corner, this vertical drawer dresser can not only serve to hold and store stuffs but also supply energy for night lamps, cell phone, tablet and more

Hidden Storage Space - There’s a sliding plate inserted into the grooves at the middle height of the first drawer, which creates an invisible hidden compartment in the lower space, where you can store your personal items like diaries, cash and valuables...

Home Decor Complement - HAIOOU wooden chest of drawers is constructed from high-quality medium-density fibreboard, coated with premium PVC on the surface. The exquisite sealing process makes it ultra smooth and flat with modern white finish, which can serve as an elegant piece of decoration in your home

Safety Always Matters - It serves as a piece of stable & reliable furniture standing on whether carpet or hardwood floor in your home without wobbling. What’s more, a set of premium quality toppling preventing device included keeps the dresser staying where it suppose to be and ensure family members' security in case there are energetic teenagers or dogs among your family

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 CHARGING STATION 2 HIDDEN STORAGE SPACE 3 PREMIUM PVC LAMINATED

The following points need to be noted: After receiving the package, please be sure to read the installation instructions in the instructions first.There are two types of cam locks and cam bolts in the parts. The larger one is for the wooden body and the other one is for the drawer. Please be sure not to mix them. Mixing may cause gaps between the boards, broken boards and other problemsThe guide rails CL and CR on the left and right side panels must be on the same level to avoid incomplete closing of the drawer.Hand tools are recommended for installation. When you choose a power tool, it is recommended that the closer it is to the board, the smaller the force to avoid damage to the board caused by excessive impact. If you have any questions, pls feel free to keep in touch with us.

Specification Product Dimensions 15.7"x31.5"x49" / 17.7"D x 29.9"W x 44.1"H Color Modern White Product Weight 86.9lb Special Feature Built-In Charging Station & Hidden Storage Space Diverse scenarios Living room, entryway Material Medium-density fibreboard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for a good price.
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for an affordable dresser to match my other one from IKEA. This was relatively easy to assemble. In assembly realized a part was broken, so I contacted the seller and they sent me a new one, no questions asked. Dresser is now put together and perfect for my minimalist wardrobe. A drawer holds about 10 tshirts rolled up and 6-8 sweats or shorts rolled up. Perfectly fit the space we were buying it for. 10/10 so far! The outlet on top is a nice feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and sturdy white dresser!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is very pretty once it's assembled. The instructions are good but there are a lot of pieces so it took me several hours by myself. I wanted something that looked like a built it and matched my white shaker bathroom cabinets and this works beautifully. I have ordered silver knobs and will change them out once they arrive.It is very nice and all the pieces were in good shape (nothing broken or chipped), and i gave it 5 stars even though there was a lot of labor involved in putting it together. Overall, a very nice piece and if you have some experience with assembling furniture, it should be fairly easy for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and good quality
reviews.reviewText: Really like how it has power on board and simple color scheme. The hidden drawer is a nice feature. It's not the easiest to use and I have nothing to hide lol but still kinda cool. The drawers are a little tiny bit loose but it's not bad it's pretty much the only criticism I could think of. The process to put it together was very simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No drawer stops; when a drawer falls out it breaks
reviews.reviewText: After assembly of this 5 piece drawer, one drawer fell to the floor when I tried to move the dresser, and one of the drawers broke in several places. There are no drawer stops in this model. After telling the seller, he was very responsive and notified the manufacture to replace the two pieces that broke. We received the replacement in a timely manner. It looks very nice in our bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dresser for a Small Space
reviews.reviewText: This dresser did not disappoint. We needed something inexpensive that would fit a small space in a small guest bedroom. Having been destroyed by Hurricane Ian, and no insurance to cover our contents, we are stretching our money to cover this area. This worked perfectly, was easy to assemble and holds sheets and clothes for our guests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have made several dressers and a stand-up closet on my own. This dresser is cheap, parts are damaged making it so I may not be able to assemble it totally. And being told that the parts that are damaged, they look like they were hit with a hammer. I may not be able to get. So I've got a half assembled dresser. That you can't send back as it's too heavy and no getting it back into a box. Service person is trying to get someone to make the pieces the two pieces part 21 and 23 that look like they were hit with a hammer. They are out of stock so he's trying to get them for me. I would not suggest getting this dresser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dresser did take a while to build with LOTS of pieces but it’s honestly worth it. The finished product seems very sturdy and it’s so sleek and clean looking. I will probably purchase another for my guest room, I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Took about 2 hours with two people to put together. dresser is very good quality and perfect size.
